sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The SW component DWA implements the application logic of the anti-theft warning system of the vehicle which must contain at least 1 acoustic warning device. DWA component must transmit a master code in order to arm the siren(DWAX - extension of DWA). DWA notifies DWAX by sending the arm request with MasterCode. If MasterCode is already generated and read correctly from NvM, the signal containing the generated MasterCode will be passed to DWAX to properly perform arming. When MasterCode is not available nor properly generated we start generating MasterCode procedure.
